title: National Treasure 2. Book Of Secrets.DvDrip.Swesub
description: Treasure hunter Ben Gates (Nicolas Cage) embarks on a new adventure in director Jon Turtletaub&#039;s sequel to NATIONAL TREASURE. Ben and his father, Patrick (Jon Voight), take great pride in their ancestors and their family&#039;s devotion to the United States. When Mitch Wilkinson (Ed Harris) produces a page from the diary of Lincoln assassin John Wilkes Booth allegedly linking Ben&#039;s great-great grandfather to the plot, Ben and Patrick set out on a path to clear their family&#039;s name. Ben also believes that the diary page contains hints to the whereabouts of a treasure map leading to an ancient city made of gold, and soon the hunt is on. Tech expert Riley Poole (Justin Bartha) and Ben&#039;s now ex-girlfriend Abigail Chase (Diane Kruger) join the Gates in their quest, which takes them from Washington, DC, to Paris, London and the Black Hills of South Dakota. It&#039;s true that the storyline and the actions of Gates and his team--which include breaking into the Queen&#039;s study at Buckingham Palace, sneaking into the Oval Office, and kidnapping the President of the United States--are completely unbelievable. But with a storyline built on true, interesting trivia and great locations, this film is an amusing, family-friendly romp. Cage has some great moments as Gates-- loyal, patriotic, fair to a fault, and very funny as he goads on Buckingham Palace security. Harris plays Wilkinson with just the right air of mystery and menace: is he after fortune, or does he just want to leave his own mark in history? Helen Mirren fits the bill as Ben&#039;s mother and Patrick&#039;s estranged ex-wife, Emily, a scholar and historian in her own right.
